item.title: Include Files Outside Docker Build Context
item.description: “Forbidden path outside the build context” I was recently attempting to use Dockerize a Node project, so I added a docker folder to the project and created a simple Dockerfile to get started: FROM node:alpine WORKDIR /app COPY ../ ./ RUN npm install EXPOSE 80 ENTRYPOINT [ "npm", "start" ] However, when I tried to build the image, I got the following output: $ docker build -t nodeapp .
